title: Mathsphere
brief_description: These videos present maths problems that may be encountered in the real world. Mathematical techniques and their applications are shown hand in hand giving relevance to a variety of topics. Areas covered include collecting and presenting data, estimating, measuring and accuracy, scale and enlargement, probability, plans and elevations. The video includes a special ‘Mathsphere activity pack’.
